marketing information: The 1900L is available in both zero-bezel APR, which senses touch on the display by recognizing the unique pattern of sounds, and standard-bezel IntelliTouch surface acoustic wave touch technologies. Wide-aspect displays like the 1900L are easier to use and incorporate into the workplace than traditional desktop touch monitors. Wide-screen format displays allow extra content on screen and are ideal in corporate environments for spreadsheets, publishing, and dual-window applications.
